ἐνευλογέομαι,
passive, to be blessed in, τῷ σπέρματί σου [LXX+NT]:—middle, take a blessing to oneself, ἀπαρχῆς [LXX]

vocabInfos.mediumDef:
(passive) to be blessed
to bless in respect of, or by means of, Acts 3:25; Gal. 3:8*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: ban phước; chúc phước; ân phước. ἐν (G1722) + εὐλογέω (G2127)
